title: Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1800
markings: Marks: On bottom very faintly impress into glass: "B. Edwards Belfast"
provenance: Cecil Davis, Ltd., London; 1965 Phelps Warren, NY.
description: Bulbous lightly blown body, 2 neck rings-knotched, everted lip, row of everted lip, row of faint molded vertical fluting bottom of sides, above engraved with a rose, thistle and shamrock; target-shaped stopper with waffle pattern; pontil mark surrounded by makers mark (faint) and light fluting to edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-177-a,b.
